text.textblock: For the reasons set out in the preamble, title 30, chapter VII, subchapter T of the Code of Federal Regulations is amended as set forth below:
1. The authority citation for part 904 continues to read as follows:
2. Section 904.25 is amended by adding paragraph (b) to read as follows:
Approval of abandoned mine land reclamation plan amendments.

(b) The following section of the Arkansas Code Annotated, title 15, pertaining to the Arkansas abandoned mine land reclamation plan, as submitted to OSM on October 6, 1993, is approved effective January 5, 1994.
Section 15-58-401(b)(2) of Arkansas Code Annotated_Lands Eligible.
3. Section 904.26 is revised to read as follows:
Pursuant to 30 CFR 884.15, Arkansas is required to submit for OSM's approval the following proposed plan amendment by the date specified.
